string-array.name: list_titles
string-array.item: In the future there are plans to make this dynamic
For now the list is loaded from an array
You can find the array in the strings.xml file
Each of these list items contain a link
By clicking on the item you should see a window to the right
At the moment this window will load a website based on your pick
In the future this will load local nOOtepad documents
It will also display the apphome and project properties
